info.name: DocsAI API v1
info.description:
Postman collection for DocsAI (contact360/docsai) Documentation API – Django service parity with Lambda Documentation API.

**Base URL**: {{base_url}}
**Local**: http://localhost:8000

**Authentication**:
- Most endpoints are public (no auth required).
- Access control is at data model level via access_control fields where applicable.

## API Structure

### REST API v1
- **Health Check**: Service info and health endpoints (root, health, database, cache, storage, external API).
- **Pages API** (`/api/v1/pages/`) – List, format, statistics, types, by-type, by-state, by user type, page detail, access-control, sections, components, endpoints, versions.
- **Endpoints API** (`/api/v1/endpoints/`) – List, format, api-versions, methods, by-api-version, by-method, by-state, by-lambda, detail, pages, access-control, lambda-services, files, methods, used-by-pages, dependencies.
- **Relationships API** (`/api/v1/relationships/`) – List, format, graph, statistics, usage-types, usage-contexts, by-page, by-endpoint, by-usage-type, by-usage-context, by-state, by-lambda, by-invocation-pattern, by-postman-config, performance, detail, access-control, data-flow, performance, dependencies, postman.
- **Postman API** (`/api/v1/postman/`) – List, statistics, format, by-state, detail, collection, environments, environment by name, mappings, mapping by id, test-suites, suite by id, access-control.
- **Index Management API** (`/api/v1/index/`) – Read and validate index for pages, endpoints, relationships, postman (no rebuild on Django).
- **Dashboard API** (`/api/v1/dashboard/`) – Paginated list endpoints for pages, endpoints, relationships, postman with filters and search.

**Total**: 110+ GET endpoints plus dashboard.

item.name: Health Check

request.description: Get service information (name, version, status). No authentication required.
Application, database, cache, storage, external API health. No authentication required.

item.description: Health check and service info endpoints (no authentication required).

Get documentation page by ID. Set page_id in path variable or collection/environment.
